trans-unit.source: Provides a common base class for controls that can be triggers for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供可做為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項觸發程序之控制項的通用基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> of the control that is a trigger for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，這個字串表示做為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 控制項觸發程序之控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控制項之 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").

The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID%2A> property must be set to the ID of a control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>, <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID%2A>屬性必須設定為實作控制項的 ID <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>， <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>介面。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether to search for the control recursively in naming containers that contain the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，表示是否在包含目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項的命名容器中遞迴地搜尋控制項。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the control specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> 屬性中指定的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A control that has the ID matching the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: ID 符合 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> 屬性的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger" /> is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" /> 或空白。

trans-unit.source: The control with the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有指定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> 的控制項。
